name: BCM Inks U.S.A. EekoPlast Inks
description: BCM Inks U.S.A. EekoPlast inks can print directly onto plastic corrugated with your current corrugated press. No additional machinery or processes are required. EekoPlast inks adhere well onto plastic corrugated and have excellent rub resistance. EekoPlast inks clean up similarly to other water-based inks.
